name: Utilitarian
description: The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the one - if a few workers have to die to create a machine capable of helping thousands, so shall it be done. Even in war, this philosophy is held.  All humans receive a 15% passive speed bonus when doing laborious tasks, such as mining blocks or commuting from one area to another. Comfort is often overlooked when ensuring the maxium amount of good, and so, plain solutions are often picked. When crafting bread, humans get 3 bread instead of the usual 1.
